frequently_asked_questions.question: What is TechCorp's refund policy?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all our products. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Do you offer training for your products?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Yes! We provide comprehensive training sessions for all our enterprise clients. Training can be done on-site or remotely.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What languages do you support?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Our products support English, French, Spanish, German, Italian, Portuguese, and Japanese.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Is there a free trial available?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all our products. No credit card required.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What kind of support do you provide?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: We offer 24/7 email support and phone support during business hours. Premium customers get dedicated account managers.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Can I integrate TechCorp products with my existing systems?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Absolutely! All our products offer REST APIs and webhooks for seamless integration with your existing infrastructure.
